useCase.name: View Expiry Dates of Ingredients
useCase.description: Chef views the expiry dates of ingredients.

preconditions.precondition: The Chef has access to the UI interface.

mainSequence.step: Chef requests expiry dates of ingredients from the UI interface.
UI interface fetches expiry dates from the server/controller.
Server/controller queries the database for ingredients with expiry dates.
Database returns expiry dates data to the server/controller.
Server/controller displays expiry dates on the UI interface.
UI interface shows expiry dates of ingredients to the Chef.
